title: Interaction Between Organizational Learning and Bureaucracy: Efficient Management Strategies in the Era of Technological Complexity

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic organizational theory and management processes
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment centered on practical training using smartphone-based VR content

learning_goals: Explain at least three impacts of technological complexity on organizational learning processes.
Recreate and analyze cases where bureaucratic structures contribute to knowledge sharing within simulations.
Propose optimal combinations of bureaucratic procedures and collaboration mechanisms in VR-based scenarios.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
